ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 174
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... ============================= I have never seen one for sale, either, but I DID have a 37th level rogue offer 100pp for mine, to which I said
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Christopher Mills <xopher@...>
>
>
>> ...you can get a Trollhide belt which raises your STR by 5 points, and
the
>> cool thing is, it is Bard/Rogue only...
>
>I've never seen one of these for sale. Perhaps a trip to the area is in
>order to hang around and see who has one weighing them down.
>
>Any idea what one might cost? I'm flat broke and overweight from some
>recent purchases of small bronze (thank Tunare I'm a Wood Elf and can
>wear the small stuff - the medium is going for twice as much...).
>Would be nice to know how much cash to bring before I make the long run.
=============================

I have never seen one for sale, either, but I DID have a 37th level rogue
offer 100pp for mine, to which I said "nada". The belt is not only NICE
because it is 4 AC, 5 STA, and 5 STR, and is Rogue/Bard only, but it also
LOOKS so cool in your inventory screen (Smile).

Tallonn Stringfellow, 35th Verse
Bertox
